nodeList.description: Cinder Strike has a chance to ignite enemies and ignites inflicted by the first attack have increased duration.

nodeList.altText:
Blinded enemies have 50% less critical hit chance and are less accurate at range. Does not stack.

Frailty causes enemies to deal 6% less damage per stack for 4 seconds (multiplicative with other modifiers). Stacking up to 3 times.
